facts.title: Olympus Mons
facts.fact: This Mars volcano is 3 times taller than Mount Everest!

facts.title: Jupiter's Great Red Spot
facts.fact: This giant storm is 2 times wider than Earth and 400 years old.

facts.title: Saturn's Rings
facts.fact: Saturn's beautiful rings are 99% pure water ice.

facts.title: Neutron Stars
facts.fact: A teaspoon of neutron star weighs 1 billion tons!

facts.title: Black Holes
facts.fact: Nothing escapes a black hole, not even light traveling at 670M mph.

facts.title: The Moon
facts.fact: Only 12 humans have ever walked on the Moon's dusty surface.

facts.title: The Sun
facts.fact: The Sun is so big that 1 million Earths could fit inside it.

facts.title: Voyager Probes
facts.fact: Voyager 1 has been traveling through space for 47 years!

facts.title: International Space Station
facts.fact: The ISS orbits Earth 16 times every single day at 17,500 mph.

facts.title: Milky Way Galaxy
facts.fact: Our galaxy contains about 400 billion stars just like our Sun.
